verses.plain: And the child Samuel ministered unto the LORD before Eli. And the word of the LORD was precious in those days; there was no open vision.

tokens.t: And the child Samuel ministered unto the
before Eli. And the word of the
was precious in those days;
no open vision.

verses.plain: And it came to pass at that time, when Eli was laid down in his place, and his eyes began to wax dim, that he could not see;

tokens.t: And it came to pass at that time, when Eli
laid down in his place, and his eyes began to wax dim,
he could not see;

verses.plain: And ere the lamp of God went out in the temple of the LORD, where the ark of God was, and Samuel was laid down to sleep;

tokens.t: And ere the lamp of God went out in the temple of the
, where the ark of God
, and Samuel was laid down

verses.plain: That the LORD called Samuel: and he answered, Here am I.

tokens.t: That the
called Samuel: and he answered, Here
I.

verses.plain: And he ran unto Eli, and said, Here am I; for thou calledst me. And he said, I called not; lie down again. And he went and lay down.

tokens.t: And he ran unto Eli, and said, Here
I; for thou calledst me. And he said, I called not; lie down again. And he went and lay down.

verses.plain: And the LORD called yet again, Samuel. And Samuel arose and went to Eli, and said, Here am I; for thou didst call me. And he answered, I called not, my son; lie down again.

tokens.t: And the
called yet again, Samuel. And Samuel arose and went to Eli, and said, Here
I; for thou didst call me. And he answered, I called not, my son; lie down again.

verses.plain: Now Samuel did not yet know the LORD, neither was the word of the LORD yet revealed unto him.

tokens.t: Now Samuel did not yet know the
, neither was the word of the
yet revealed unto him.

verses.plain: And the LORD called Samuel again the third time. And he arose and went to Eli, and said, Here am I; for thou didst call me. And Eli perceived that the LORD had called the child.

tokens.t: And the
called Samuel again the third time. And he arose and went to Eli, and said, Here
I; for thou didst call me. And Eli perceived that the
had called the child.

verses.plain: Therefore Eli said unto Samuel, Go, lie down: and it shall be, if he call thee, that thou shalt say, Speak, LORD; for thy servant heareth. So Samuel went and lay down in his place.

tokens.t: Therefore Eli said unto Samuel, Go, lie down: and it shall be, if he call thee, that thou shalt say, Speak,
; for thy servant heareth. So Samuel went and lay down in his place.

verses.plain: And the LORD came, and stood, and called as at other times, Samuel, Samuel. Then Samuel answered, Speak; for thy servant heareth.

tokens.t: And the
came, and stood, and called as at other times, Samuel, Samuel. Then Samuel answered, Speak; for thy servant heareth.

verses.plain: ¶ And the LORD said to Samuel, Behold, I will do a thing in Israel, at which both the ears of every one that heareth it shall tingle.

tokens.t: ¶ And the
said to Samuel, Behold, I will do a thing in Israel, at which both the ears of every one that heareth it shall tingle.

verses.plain: In that day I will perform against Eli all things which I have spoken concerning his house: when I begin, I will also make an end.

tokens.t: In that day I will perform against Eli all
which I have spoken concerning his house: when I begin, I will also make an end.

verses.plain: For I have told him that I will judge his house for ever for the iniquity which he knoweth; because his sons made themselves vile, and he restrained them not.

tokens.t: For I have told him that I will judge his house for ever for the iniquity which he knoweth; because his sons made themselves vile, and he restrained them not.

verses.plain: And therefore I have sworn unto the house of Eli, that the iniquity of Eli’s house shall not be purged with sacrifice nor offering for ever.

tokens.t: And therefore I have sworn unto the house of Eli, that the iniquity of Eli’s house shall not be purged with sacrifice nor offering for ever.

verses.plain: ¶ And Samuel lay until the morning, and opened the doors of the house of the LORD. And Samuel feared to shew Eli the vision.

tokens.t: ¶ And Samuel lay until the morning, and opened the doors of the house of the
. And Samuel feared to shew Eli the vision.

verses.plain: Then Eli called Samuel, and said, Samuel, my son. And he answered, Here am I.

tokens.t: Then Eli called Samuel, and said, Samuel, my son. And he answered, Here
I.

verses.plain: And he said, What is the thing that the Lord hath said unto thee? I pray thee hide it not from me: God do so to thee, and more also, if thou hide any thing from me of all the things that he said unto thee.

tokens.t: And he said, What
the thing that
hath said unto thee? I pray thee hide
not from me: God do so to thee, and more also, if thou hide
thing from me of all the things that he said unto thee.

verses.plain: And Samuel told him every whit, and hid nothing from him. And he said, It is the LORD: let him do what seemeth him good.

tokens.t: And Samuel told him every whit, and hid nothing from him. And he said, It
the
: let him do what seemeth him good.

verses.plain: ¶ And Samuel grew, and the LORD was with him, and did let none of his words fall to the ground.

tokens.t: ¶ And Samuel grew, and the
was with him, and did let none of his words fall to the ground.

verses.plain: And all Israel from Dan even to Beer-sheba knew that Samuel was established to be a prophet of the LORD.

tokens.t: And all Israel from Dan even to Beer-sheba knew that Samuel
established
a prophet of the

verses.plain: And the LORD appeared again in Shiloh: for the LORD revealed himself to Samuel in Shiloh by the word of the LORD.

tokens.t: And the
appeared again in Shiloh: for the
revealed himself to Samuel in Shiloh by the word of the

footnotes.text: Now…: or, Thus did Samuel before he knew the LORD, and before the word of the LORD was revealed unto him
For I…: or, And I will tell him
restrained…: Heb. frowned not upon them
every…: Heb. all the things, or, words
